the first time i saw my dad cry was on christmas eve when i had my first trip home my dad couldnt make it to my graduation from navy boot and it was around months he hadnt seen me i turned in the middle of boot and everyone thought i wouldnt be home for another months i caught a flight from san diego my gfs dad picked me up at the airport without telling anyone i literally just quietly snuck in to hear my dad saying he is too busy and too tired to enjoy christmas right now i hid around the corner and said is the battery in my malibu charged up my dad said i just ran it a few days awhat i had never seen the man emotional he never hugged me that i could remember but that moment he couldnt talk he hugged me kissed my forehead towed me to the fridge opened a miller high life bottle handed it to me and finally said i have been waiting to do this for months as it was our first beer together my mom she walked around the corner with tray of food and dropped it my grandpa interrupted and said have you been taking steroids from that moment on my dad hugged me every time he saw me until he died in

a miracle in the operating room on june i was in the operating room of a hospital where i was undergoing a cesarean section for my second daughter and i suffered a fatal hemorrhage suddenly i saw myself falling as if down a rocky shaft i was head up and feet down as if i had entered an elevator and the floor had disappeared and i had plummeted downwards thats how i saw myself descending i didnt know what was happening to me i only felt terrible pain from my cesarean section but it was hundreds of times greater than the pain felt in the physical body i didnt know i had died nor did i know where i was going but i was filled with panic terror an indescribable fear far greater than i could have felt on earth i was falling completely naked my hair flying around all disheveled the further i descended the more terror increased i didnt know where i was going but i sensed i wasnt going to like that place down there as i got closer to the bottom i began to hear agonizing screams like millions of people in constant torment screaming ayyyy yaaa nooo please nooooooooo much for mercy and they also screamed in desperation water aaaguuaaa aaaguuaaa and they cried anguishedly in a heartbreaking way when i heard all this my terror fear panic increased and i screamed desperately my god what is happening to me at that moment i saw a large hand with a wide very white sleeve with blue flashes and at that moment i saw myself in the operating room of the hospital where they performed the cesarean section i was floating above the operating table and surprised i noticed that there was a dead body on said table and when i saw its face i screamed but thats me a second later i saw myself flying upwards i passed some very white clouds and i saw myself dressed in a very white tunic and my hair combed and still i reached the top something like a large hallway and on my left side i could see a large garden with beautiful flowers birds and multicolored butterflies all in soft colors i saw that everything is alive there is no death i noticed that the flowers and everything i saw were singing in a soft tone even the air itself everything was praising god in unison out of the corner of my eye something caught my attention on my right side and when i turned around i saw a large halfopen door from which a beautiful golden light was coming out curiosity got the better of me and i tried to walk over there to see what was behind that large door but i couldnt move it seemed like there was glue under my feet and in that instant i saw him he was standing between me and the door majestic beautiful it was jesus he was so tall that i could only see the right side of his body from the shoulder down just before his feet i never saw his face he was dressed in a very white robe with a gold belt i saw him raise his hand and instinctively knew he was going to bring me back so i raised my arms and said no lord he told me literally its not your time yet you have to return to earth because you have a ministry to fulfill there immediately i saw my spirit entering my dead physical body and i woke up and groaned weakly a cleaning lady was cleaning up the blood i had left there in the operating room when she saw me moving and complaining she ran out tripping getting up and the dead woman is alive the dead woman is alive the dead woman is alive in an instant the doctors arrived and when they saw that i was alive they couldnt believe it and said to each other it cant be she doesnt have a drop of blood or any other fluid in her body and shed been dead for minutes this has to be a miracle and they filled my entire body with needles injecting me with blood at full speed ivs and glucose my gynecologist said put her in such and such a room this girl wont last hours and look at me years have passed since then but this isnt all months later at the end of november i had another experience with death i suffered a massive heart attack and died suddenly i found myself standing on a beach and i saw again that great hand that had pulled me out of hell in that hand he held my shattered heart he put his hand into the sea and when he pulled it out he had a new beating heart and placed it in my chest i woke up from death for the second time i thanked god for giving me my spiritual birth john and what literally happened to me is what is written in ezekiel where jehovah says i will remove the heart of stone and give you one of flesh and i will make it beat and you will be my people and i will be your god before all this i did not believe in god or heaven or hell but now i understand that they do exist all are real many follow doctrines of men and demons they are deceived and lost for not knowing god i recommend that you read the reina valera bible i have years of ministry i began as a christian missionary a bible teacher of sound doctrine preaching in prisons and on the streets to drug addicts and prostitutes many souls won for christ and i never asked for money to work in the work of god jesus gave us everything for free so let us give freely free of charge what we have freely received the gospel of jesus is not for sale it should not be profited from eternal glory to him christ loves you true testimony of what christ did for me alma rodriguez

un milagro en el quirfano el de junio de estaba yo en el quirfano de un hospital donde se me practicaba una cesrea de mi segunda hija y tuve una hemorragia fatal de pronto me v cayendo como por un pozo de piedra iba cabeza arriba y pies abajo como si hubiera entrado a un elevador y el piso no hubiera estado y yo me hubiera ido vertiginosamente al vacio as me vi descendiendo no saba que me estaba pasando solo senta un terrible dolor por mi cesrea pero aumentado cientos de veces al dolor que se siente en el cuerpo fsico no saba que haba muerto ni saba a donde iba pero iba llena de pnico un terror miedo indescriptible mucho mayor al que hubiera podido sentir en la tierra iba cayendo totalmente desnuda con mi cabello volando todo despeinado entre mas descenda el terror aumentaba no saba a donde iba pero presenta que no me iba a agradar ese lugar abajo al ir acercandome mas al fondo comenc a or gritos agnicos como de millones de personas en tormento constante gritaban ayyyy yaaa nooo por piedad ya nooooo y tambien gritaban con desesperacion aguuaa aaaguuaaa aaaguuaaa y lloraban angustiosamente de una manera desgarradora al oir yo todo eso mi terror miedo pnico aument y grit desesperada dios mo que me est pasando en ese instante v una gran mano con una manga ancha blanqusima con destellos azules y al momento me vi en el quirfano del hospital donde me practicaron la cesrea estaba yo flotando sobre la mesa de operaciones y sorprendida me fij que haba un cuerpo muerto sobre dicha mesa y cuando le v la cara grit pero si esa soy yo un segundo despues me vi volando hacia arriba pas unas nubes muy blancas y me vi vestida con una tnica blanqusima y mi cabello peinado y quieto llegu arriba como a un gran pasillo y pude ver a mi lado izquierdo un gran jardin con hermosas flores aves y mariposas multicolores todo en colores suaves vi que todo est vivo all no existe la muerte me fij que las flores y todo lo que vi cantaban en tono suave hasta el aire todo alababa a dios al unsono de reojo algo llam mi atencion a mi lado derecho y al voltear vi una gran puerta entre abierta de donde sala una luz dorada preciosa la curiosidad me gan y trat de caminar hacia all para ver que haba detras de esa gran puerta pero no pude moverme parecia que tena pegamento debajo de mis pies y en ese instante lo vi estaba parado entre la puerta y yo majestuoso hermoso era jesus era tan grande que solo pude ver el lado derecho de su cuerpo del hombro hacia abajo un poco antes de sus pies nunca v su rostro estaba vestido con una tnica blanqusima con un cinturon de oro v que levant su mano y supe por instinto que me iba a regresar y levant mis brazos y le dije no seor el me dijo textualmente aun no es tu tiempo tu tienes que regresar a la tierra porque tienes un ministerio que i rode on amtrak with my yearold daughter the employees ensured me that the ride was about hours long but it turned out to be hours i had only brought enough food for meals i had no money the passengers fed me and my daughter for the other hours same daughter in junior high was stealing from me and selling my things at school the school brought me in and asked me not to punish her they then asked me if it was true that i had been going without food in order to take care of our family i tried to deny it and then told them it wasnt a problem for me they brought us food and then provided christmas for our family of also in wisconsin whenever i or anyone else slid off the icy roads multiple people would stop and help and would not leave until the driver was back on the road one long road trip going through kansas my car broke down with me and my little girls on a highway around midnight it was very dark and freezing and the traffic was going mph on average with a small shoulder off the side of the highway the next exit was maybe miles down the road a couple took the next exit went back the other way and took that exit and then came back and stopped to help they had called for a tow truck and then gave us a ride offering to allow us to stay the night in their home with them in stlouis mo a young man stopped to change my tire on the freeway i told him it wasnt necessary since id called my insurance co and then had called for a tow truck which would arrive in an hour he didnt think we were safe on the side of the freeway and so he changed my tire all by himself and refused payment that same trip a police officer pulled me over for having expired tags wed visited family in the south for christmas and the car was packed to the brim with christmas gifts the officers took us to our apartment cant drive on expired tags and unloaded everything in that car an elderly neighbor knew i was struggling and when she burned her back and shoulder falling asleep on a heating pad she insisted on paying me an outrageous amount to apply her burn cream until she healed while there are plenty of people who do not care and even plenty who enjoy the pain and suffering of others there are a whole lot of people who are kind and generous these are only a few of the times i have experienced kindness from complete strangers

legislation enabling this in march two years later his government adopted sweeping laws to further facilitate the auctioning off of kievs public assets and industry to foreign actors however a moratorium on private sale of arable land imposed in remained in place no matter in august the european court of human rights ruled this was illegal there was still one problem though opinion polls consistently showed ukrainian citizens overwhelmingly rejected privatisation and the sale of their countrys agricultural land to overseas buyers as luck would have it the proxy wars eruption and imposition of martial law allowed for industrial scale trampling by volodomyr zelenskys government over public opinion and political opposition throughout a series of controversial laws intended to make privatization as easy as possible for foreign investors were passed without hindrance in the process close to nationalised enterprises were offered up for overseas sale and auctions for purchase of these entities under simplified terms convened the next year these efforts intensified with further legislation enacted enabling largescale privatisation of state assets and state companies this was reportedly motivated by the attractiveness of ukraines large state assets to institutional investors they included an odessabased ammonia factory major mining and chemical firms one of the countrys leading power generators and a producer of highquality titanium products encouraged by the wests reception to these moves in july kiev announced a dedicated largescale privatisation plan with yet more prize assets under the hammer little wonder two months later a british foreign office briefing document openly acknowledged it viewed the invasion not only as a crisis but also as an opportunity londons primary economic aid project in ukraine is explicitly concerned with ensuring the country adopts and implements economic reforms that create a more inclusive economy enhancing a personal tribute to a legacy of compassion dignity and tireless service of the christian nuns to humanity the recent developments involving the sisters of green gardens convent cherthala have brought their name into public attention for many of us who have known them intimatelynot through news but through decades of lived experiencethis has been a time of deep reflection when leprosy was still a visible challenge in our society many patients were often left untreated or shunned the sisters of green gardens convent stepped forward in those days opening their hearts and doors to the afflicted they cared for them with quiet love and restored not only health but also dignity the convent has never been about grandeur or recognition it has been a wellspring of mercy a place from which acts of healing and service have flowed steadily over the decades from founding homes for the deaf and mute to building hospitals and schools their work has touched lives in kerala uttar pradesh and other remote corners of the country these sisters followed a simple life rooted in prayer service and solidarity with the poor even in distant villages the sisters were lights of hopeoffering education healthcare and human warmth at a time like this it is important to recall and honour these quiet contributions in a world that often forgets the invisible caregivers and silent healers we must take a moment to remember those who have dedicated their lives to the service of the forgotten let india continue to be a land where the selfless are remembered with gratitudewhere mercy flows quietly like a mighty river nourishing all whom it touches

i am a christian belonging to the syro malabar church in kerala i live in mumbai and i condemn the persecution of christians who have lived in india for nearly years our god jesus christ the second person of the most blessed trinity came down to earth to teach us the way to heaven jesus taught us to love and care for the poor and commanded us to love and serve the least of our brethren the nuns were simply followings the teachings of lord jesus they spent their youthful years and now their middle age doing just that our constitution gives us the right to follow whichever faith we wish to follow even if our constitution didnt bestow this right on us i would still choose to follow publicly the christian faith i am not a nun that is a life of great many sacrifices but in my own little ways i do help people like the maid in my house whom i treat with the full dignity that a fellow child of god should receive so too the poor around me for my acts of charity i too run the risk of being jailed what a pity that our country is being reduced to a nation of barbarians i do hope and pray that these lovely saintly nuns are released immediately how many of us would be willing to throw away our lives for the sake of the poor and underprivileged with no earthly returns whatsoever voluntarily taking the vows of poverty chastity and obedience think about it my dear fellow indians

what i love about this moment is how it plays into batmans character arc leading into infinite crisis the tower of babel incident showed that batman was indeed pragmatic to a fault and willing to be unhanded for the greater good but that could be brushed off as simply batman being cautious and even justifiable half the league even agrees with him to an extent however batman remembering the mind wipe sends him spiraling because at the end of the day batmans greatest asset in a world of superhumans is his mind yet zatanna was able to overcome even that with a few words on the surface batmans contingencies are simply him being practical and realistic however underneath the surface they are also manifestations of batmans growing paranoia and need for control batmans actions during this time the contingencies brother eye pushing the league away even rejoining the outsiders with himself as leader despite having left the group for years are all him trying to regain some semblance of control and power because after all the last time bruce was powerless and had no control he had to watch as his parents die still he loses control anyway ras steals his plans and nearly kills the league the outsiders fall apart maxwell lord steals brother eye and suddenly the biggest threat to humanity was created by batman then we come to infinite crisis where batman spends much of the event helpless to do anything supervillains are running wild in the streets omacs are hunting down superhumans and the amazons bludhaven was nuked and as the cherry on top reality itself was being ripped apart by alexander luthor and superboy prime sure batman led the operation to destroy brother i but freaking booster gold had to do the initial legwork to figure how they could even find it and track down the key to doing so jaime reyes then everything comes to a head for batman during the battle for metropolis when nightwing took a shot meant for bruce dick had been bruces last bit of hope in the world and when bruce thought he lost his first son he broke he needed control he needed to feel like he could do something to bring order in this world that now felt so far beyond him he couldnt do anything to stop the real threat a rampaging superboy prime but he could pick up a gun and shoot alexander luthor for causing all this so thats what he does batman attempts to kill a man not because it was the only option or even because he was defending another he betrayed everything he stood for because he was scared and angry and desperately wanted to feel in control again its a shame that the only takeaway from tower of babel was prep time beats everything because the best thing about the story is how it fits into this longer story arc of how bruce wayne was brought to his lowest point however noble bruces intentions and however understandable his motivations were at the start his paranoia sent him spiraling he never got the control he so desperately sought and the pursuit of it broke him in the end its some great character work to watch and im always a little disappointed it doesnt get talked about more
in a way if ya want to stretch it this incident helped pave the way for ted cords death

halm blackhawk crewchief us army retired with over years and hours of flight experience here the first thing i did when i heard of this accident was to look for pictures of the wreckage for the one clue i was dreading to find and i found it yes the altitude was an issue however when we fly at night we typically fly with two crewchiefs in the back one on each side if only one is available we typically have the guy sit on the rightrear seat opposite end of the collision for advisory mainly because the tail rotor is on the right side the left position light is red and the glow of it severely diminishes the ability to see under goggles on the left the right side is the greenblue position light and does not affect the nvgs at all this has been an issues since the nvgs came on the scene yet the military has not bothered to make a permanent change to it to make matters worse the aircraft had wings on it not typical for additional external tanks that wing on the left amplifies and reflects that red light glow back to the left side of the pilots and crews peripheral where the plane came from which drowns out planes lights with the city lights this is why i always mandated that my guys paint the top half of that light cover does not prevent other traffic from seeing you to drastically limit the red light from affecting nvgs of the pilot and crew on the left side if the helicopter needed the wings the wings come with another red light making two red lights we would also paint the top half of that red light as well due to a red haze affect on the left side just past the wing affecting the goggles this has personally helped meus see traffic and obstacles at a greater distance and clarity then an unmodified light unfortunately the investigation team will lock on to the altitudecommunicationroute discrepancies and hang their hat on that as the main causes if you find the pictures or videos online of the helicopter wreckage you will find the wing and the red light fully intact and not modified for nvg flying as mentioned earlier maybe this will finally move the needle and make this modification mandatory in short two left side red lights and no crewchief on the left are in my opinion the main reasons why the plane did not stand out to be seen and was missed by the left side crewpilot

it was later determined that the stick shaker trigger had been set improperly so when the stick shaker engaged the aircraft was not actually in or near a stall condition however when the captain reacted inappropriately to the stick shaker by pulling the nose up the aircraft entered an actual stall and the stick pusher activated as designed it pushed the nose down to recover from the stall but the captain again reacted improperly and overrode the pusher by pulling back again on the control column causing the plane to lose even more airspeed and control

hog wash investigators have determined that turkish airlines flight crashed mainly because the pilots didnt recognize the consequences of the warnings no the main cause was a design flaw by boeing that the pilots were not trained to lookout for the malicious domino effects of the faulty reading then came into play under circumstances which masked the symptoms produced by those effects early in the video i pondered on why there was no override switch for ground proximity radar feed to the autopilot system aps having a mute button to silence an audio alarm is nice but if a crew determines that a critical flight reading and it is why they often have duplicates is faulty not only should they be able to silence the audible warning but to as well cut its data feed to the aps how can that not be obvious to boeing or any large commercial plane maker once determined to be in error the override would be enacted manually by the pilot and the aps computer could then use the feed from the other radar sensor or at the very least not be subject to faulty data causing the plane to behave catastrophically while it might could be said that the ultimate cause was due to the pilots lack of attentiveness it wasnt in fact the main cause the main cause was a boeing design flaw without a doubt if you design a machine to perform based upon inputs that can be faulty without providing an override opportunity for the crew then it is the designer who is at fault

in the early s we were modifying a small motor used to control on helicopters a helicopter with one of our parts that we had modified ashed in los angeles california it was a news helicopter crashed into a building it was big news at the time the faa started their investigation going through each and every item extremely thorough investigation the week before they started to investigate our process they found out the cause of the helicopter crash we had spent two months preparing for the investigation not two months of working every single day it was the process of preparing that took two months due to the details the faa requires what type of cutting fluid we used the manufacture of the cutting fluid has to provide the chemicals they used to make the cutting fluid what type of tool we use to modify the motors the manufacture of the tool manufacture of the material the tool is made out of these are very thorough investigations we knew we did our job correctly however the faa doesnt care what you know they care about verifying every single detail down to the packaging we put the motors in for shipping for example putting them into plastic bags would the plastic bag have any effect on the motor the amount and type of packing material we use the manufacturer of the material etc and not only takes up a tremendous amount of our time it takes up a tremendous amount of our suppliers and our suppliers suppliers time it is incredibly detailed work for every single item until they find out the cause of the crash process of elimination every single thing they find out that was made perfectly they can cross it off of their list this is the reason these investigations take so long one or two years is not uncommon however there are rapid investigations that go much quicker due to safety concerns regarding the airlines fleets

the fbi rated one of our suppliers in silicon valley and close the company down for selling fake aircraft parts after this happened the entire industry changed and documentation was required with each and every order even for hardware not going in airplanes we were given choices of the quality of hardware we were purchasing identifying the most important things how they were manufactured the type of material and the heat treating for example threads on a bolt can either be rolled or cut cutting is way more expensive they can even be ground after heat treating because the edge of the threads come to a fairly sharp point during the heat treating process that edge can easily be damaged from the heat so the bolt would be heat treated and then the threads would be brown afterheat treating for government parts we can have up to pages of documentation starting with the manufacturer of the material all the way through turning the material into hardware treating etc

air canada flight was a nearmiss incident that occurred on july at san francisco international airport heres what happened the flight an airbus a was cleared to land on runway r but mistakenly lined up with parallel taxiway c where four fully loaded passenger airplanes were stopped awaiting takeoff clearance the crew initiated a goaround after spotting aircraft lights and receiving a warning from air traffic control and another pilot according to the national transportation safety board ntsb the plane descended to feet above the ground before starting to climb missing collision with one of the aircraft on the taxiway by just feet probable cause the ntsb determined the probable cause was the flight crews confusion of the runway with the taxiway due to ineffective review of notams the crew didnt notice that runway l was closed failure to use ils the crew didnt tune in the instrument landing system frequency for backup guidance pilot fatigue the captain had been awake for hours and the first officer had no significant rest for hours aftermath the incident led to changes in air canadas approach procedures and training as well as recommendations to the federal aviation administration faa to improve safety measures such as enhanced notam system to prioritize and present relevant information more effectively airport safety enhancements to alert controllers of potential conflicts between runway and taxiway movements crew resource management to reduce expectation bias and improve situational awareness

i would like to point out that the b had a center fuel tank which wing tags would cycle through during leveling of the aircraft its time to degenerates sparks from static generated by the fuel passing through the fuel lines within the tank the center tank bs exploded in midair before the cause was found since then anytime a b was flying with an empty center tank it was required to have to lb of dry ice dumped into the tank which would then displace any oxygen in the tank would be sealed an industrywide notice was sent in boeing who made the bs in conjunction with grumman was told to change the tank design and the transfer lines in a manner that could be filled refitted since those changes were made no bs with using empty center tanks for short flights exploded in midair it can be assumed from my point of view that the pilots decide to play it safe rather than risk and just directly pump to the engines from the wing tanks but the risk of sparking of any kind near the tanks was well understood and only an accountant would change designs to take such a risk to save or cents per wire not on like they did with the a warthog many times design flaws come not from the designers but from the accountants wanting to make a few extra cents per plane and yet there never held responsible for it

some things to keep in mind before buying a neo if you wanted to make vlogs or any other profit making content as discribed in the video youll need a faa part licence which will cost you about the same as the drone itself roughly legally in the usa and many other places the remote pilot in command must be able to stop any automated flight modes immediately that means flying without a controller which is the main appeal of the neo is illegal the neo lacks collision avoidance sensors it has some kind of ai system using the camera but ive seen plenty of videos of that fail and obvious that only works flying forward there is a known issue while flying with no controller where the gps gets confused and causes the drone to fly off into the sunset uncommanded and as far as i can tell completely randomly my advice for getting into drones would be to skip the neo and go for a mini or mini k depending on your budget as well as a part also please learn the laws about drones the community is getting a bad enough reputation due to ukraine and chinese combat drones as well as people being assholes with them the last thing we need is more excuses for lawmakers to overregulate drones more than they have done already

you got poppy playtime nah but i got the history of playtime co poppy playtimes elliot ludwig founded playtime co in the same year that his marriage fell apart resulting in divorce its fair to say that his dedication to his work and workaholic lifestyle contributed to his wife leaving him however the loss of his love didnt deter ludwig from achieving his dream of bringing joy to children he worked tirelessly to create a line of toys that children love in fact he went the extra mile with the launch of playcare an onsite orphanage ludwig believed that all children should feel love and comfort while this appears to be a humanitarian mission we all know it has unfathomable consequences for children and employees alike still this seemed to be a great venture for a while at least until the death of a family member in though we have no concrete evidence of this a popular conclusion is that its his daughter a loss of that magnitude certainly explains the drastic actions he takes further down the line this could well be the catalyst for what we all know is to come during poppy playtime chapter theres an untitled red tape thats very easy to miss this tape sees poppy discussing the aftermath of the hour of joy and reveals herself to be elliot ludwigs daughter explaining that things were better when he was in charge while the details are still foggy this leads us to believe that poppy was sick or died at a relatively young age and playtime cos experiments began as a means of bringing her and other sick children back in the bodies of toys this is supported by other tapes found throughout the chapter where employees reflect on some of the awful things theyve seen inside the factory justifying it because of the great work and results that may come of it if the experiments continue unfortunately it looks like these experiments got out of hand over time potentially when ludwig was no longer in control resulting in far more torture pain suffering and death than good the experiments the pure intentions of ludwigs company and its playcare orphanage turned to dust with the loss of his loved one for this is when the abhorrent experiments begin ludwig wanted to put people into the toys and that led to some disastrous results however before we dive into the horrors we need to point out that some experiments are consensual not that this makes up for the way playtime co tries to play god in a couple of cases we actually know the people behind the toy and we think were likely to uncover more of them in later chapters thomas clarke thomas clarke is a rare example of a consenting experiment in he signed up to be a subject when hes diagnosed with lung cancer and this resulted in him becoming poppy playtimes bron marie payne this is a heartbreaking story as a kind and caring woman went through unceremonious torture and experimentation that ultimately turned her into poppy playtimes mommy long legs as well discuss in the chapter section she harbors a lot of anger resentment and hostility making her an incredibly dangerous individual to the playtime co staff however as her transfer request indicates shes not always been this way in fact she was known to be a very motherly being loving and looking after the children in the game station a little extra tidbit is that her last name payne sounds exactly like pain i wonder if this is an unfortunate coincidence or a foreboding omen of whats to become of her makayla hyssop makayla hyssop was a test subject who turned into a poppy playtime candy cat toy unfortunately playcare had essentially become a breeding ground for experimentation by this point here the children were required to complete three different tests not that theyre aware thats what theyre doing through these tests playtime co employees could determine how successful an experiment may be theodore grambell an orphan of playcare theodore is the child who goes on to become catnap he had an imaginary friend that caused some concern with the staff which is unsurprising given it turns out his pal was the prototype experiment led the child into all sorts of trouble and to put a stop to his rebellious nature the staff made him part of the bigger bodies initiative as catnap theodore was in charge of putting the children to sleep in playcare preventing their escape and even kidnapping them as the staff commanded quinn navidson another orphan of playcare quinn navidson was a troubled and shy child who frequently ripped the heads off toys and switched them out for other toys heads due to a desire to make them prettier this behavior even spilled over into his trials at the game station where he was noted as having bitten the heads off some of the whackawuggy plushies dr harley sawyer took a special interest in navidson believing that the child held himself back so that others would have lower expectations of him sawyer convinced navidson that he could see the real version of him encouraging him to try harder at the tests which resulted in much better scores following this in sawyer chose navidson to become experiment the bigger bodies experiment title for poppy playtimes yarnaby documents originally describe yarnaby as docile agile and highly impressionable surprisingly not showing the signs of hostility that other experiments displayed towards scientists and staff sawyer saw this as an opportunity deciding to isolate him and manipulate him into becoming his personal bodyguard following sawyers removal yarnaby lapsed into an unresponsive state longing for his master to return however in chapter we see that yarnaby got his wish serving under the new version of the doctor and behaving in a far more hostile manner at his command riley riley was an orphan who entered the playcare in august at age following the death of her parents riley initially felt like an outsider due to most of the other children having arrived at the orphanage at a much earlier age noting her feelings and memories in a journal that you can find scattered throughout chapter in her diary she recounts the process of trying to fit in then her feelings upon being chosen by dr white initially believing that it meant shed been adopted by a couple however her later entries reveal that she was instead transported to the prison beneath the factory and given a shot after which her skin opened up like flower petals and she saw a man who looked like a doctor digging around inside me taking thigs out after this she found that everything hurt and her body wasnt hers any more implying that shed been turned into an experiment during and after the hour of joy riley hid inside her cell and refused to eat bodies like the other survivors she later noted that the train is the main method of transport in and out of the prison deciding to take the key from the dead conductor to make sure no one else can come here hoping that she can at least save just one person as the protagonist you find the key with rileys corpse in chapter her body appears to be a skeleton with pink fur and a tattered blue ribbon around her neck suggesting that she was a failed first attempt at making a bigger bodies variant of poppy playtimes kissy missy this is supported by the huggy wuggy we know being noted as experiment and the kissy missy we work alongside having the name of experiment suggesting that there was another experiment between the two and leading us to believe that riley was in fact experiment
